## utils.colour.hsvToHex() function

Converts an HSV triplet to hex representation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hsvToHex(h: number, s: number, v: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  h | number | Hue value in \[0, 360\]. |
|  s | number | Saturation value in \[0, 1\]. |
|  v | number | Brightness in \[0, 255\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Hex representation of the colour.
